title: FEATURE JOBS: POPSUGAR Australia, HEY GENTS, Muscle Protein + More
text:
Do you want to join one of the Australia’s biggest and most influential women’s lifestyle publications? Then you have come to the right place! POPSUGAR Australia are on the look out for a full time Beauty & Wellness Writer (SYD) to represent them at key media events, to establish and grow meaningful relationships with key influencers and to monitor engagement. To be in the running for this role, you must have strong knowledge of beauty and wellness trends, 2+ years experience in journalism, a can-do attitude and strong visual sensibilities. If you think you are the person for the job, apply today!

Another lifestyle publication is hiring, this time for a Content Production Coordinator (SYD) role! HEY GENTS are looking for a casual Content Production Coordinator to help manage and produce their online articles, social media posts and newsletters. You will need to have design and research skills, proficiency in key social media platforms and an understanding of HEY GENTS aesthetic, audience and tone of voice. The role will involve researching and curating content, photoshopping images, posting articles to HEY GENTS Facebook, Twitter and Instagram stories and preparing email newsletters through Mailchimp! Apply today if you are interested.

Have you previously worked in a digital marketing role with a key focus on e-commerce? Then you would be interested in Muscle Protein’s new E-Commerce Specialist (BNE) position! The successful applicant will be responsible for driving the sales and growth of the business, reporting to the CEO. A typical day in this role would be managing Muscle Protein’s digital marketing across marketing automation, social, web, optimisation and coordination, reviewing channel strategies and websites and completing regular reports. You must have experience in leading a digital marketing ecommerce store, solid analytical skills and know all the latest trends and best practices in online marketing. You will get to work with a fun and supportive team whilst spending your work days wearing activewear and drinking protein shakes! Apply now.

Want more jobs? Check them out below!

The Paper Empire, Australia’s leading independent retailer of stationery and invitations are looking for a full time Retail Assistant (MELB) to join their team! Apply here.

Werx Pty Ltd seek a full time Project Manager/Senior Account Manager for a media and advertising agency in Sydney’s CBD. Apply now.

PONDER, a new music storytelling platform, are hiring a casual Music Content Writer to review review albums, eps and singles. Apply today.
